mapper.sql: tb_id, title, description, `range`, coordinate, max_count, create_time, update_time, `status`, money, start_time, user_id, proxy_id

insert into activity
title,
description,
`range`,
coordinate,
max_count,
create_time,
update_time,
`status`,
money,
start_time,
user_id,
proxy_id,

mapper.update:
update activity
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`range` = #{range,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
coordinate = #{coordinate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
max_count = #{maxCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},

update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
`status` = #{status,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
money = #{money,jdbcType=INTEGER},
start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
proxy_id = #{proxyId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where tb_id = #{tbId,jdbcType=INTEGER},

update activity set title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `range` = #{range,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, coordinate = #{coordinate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, max_count = #{maxCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, `status` = #{status,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, money = #{money,jdbcType=INTEGER}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, proxy_id = #{proxyId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where tb_id = #{tbId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
